content: **drops crocheted bikini-top in safran and knit shorts in paris** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the marilyn tan shorts pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ bikini-top **sizes** s - m - l **materials** garnstudio safran 50-50-50 gr nr 18 natural drops 3 mm / us c crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge accessories natural white ribbon approx 130-140-150 cm long approx 15 mm wide for lower edge and 2 natural white ribbons approx 100 cm long approx 10 mm wide for straps 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/90-22-b---marilyn-tan-shorts
